body.p:
RICHARD H. COLLINS,
Attorney and Counselor at Law,
CINCINNATI, O.
Office, No. 68 West Third Street, between Walnut and Vine, opposite "Bank of the Ohio Valley."
☞Special attention given to the Collection of Claims in all the Western States, Kentucky and Tennessee. In sending Claims, don't fail to give the individual names of all FIRMS, whether owning the claims or liable in any way as payer.
Cincinnati, O., April 10th, 1863.

The undersigned Richard H. Collins, having been duly commissioned by the Governor of Kentucky as Commissioner of Deeds, &c., for said State within the State of Ohio, with my Office at present at No. 68 West Third Street, Cincinnati, being about to enter on the duties of my said office, do, in compliance with the Statute authorizing said appointment, make and subscribe this affidavit -- well and truly to execute and perform all the duties of said station. Witness my hand this 10th day of April, 1863.
Sworn to before me by Richard H. Collins, this 10th day of April, 1863, as witness my hand & seal

Jno E Hamilton
Notary Public
Kenton Conty
Kentucky.

Ohio
Oath
Richd H. Collins
Comr of Deeds
Filed Apr 13th 1863
